Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result.ScenarioResult

  • Packages that use ScenarioResult 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function
    Contains the interfaces implemented by functions that perform calculations in the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result
    Types which are used as return values from calculation functions.

    • Uses of ScenarioResult in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function

      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function that return types with arguments of type ScenarioResult 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Collector<T,List<T>,ScenarioResult<T>> FunctionUtils.toScenarioResult()
      Returns a collector which can be used at the end of a stream of results to build a ScenarioResult.

    • Uses of ScenarioResult in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.result that implement ScenarioResult 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CurrencyValuesArray
      A currency-convertible scenario result for a single currency, holding one amount for each scenario.
      class  DefaultScenarioResult<T>
      A scenario result holding one value for each scenario.
      class  MultiCurrencyValuesArray
      A currency-convertible scenario result for multi-currency amounts, holding one amount for each scenario.
      class  SingleScenarioResult<T>
      A scenario result holding one value that is valid for all scenarios.
      class  ValuesArray
      A scenario result holding one double value for each scenario.
